=== Contact Methods ===

The Chicago Team has many ways to stay in touch and disseminate information. Here are links to our primary contact resources:

* '''<nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/InternetRelayChat|IRC]]</nowiki>:''' #ubuntu-chicago on irc.freenode.net
* '''Webpage:''' http://www.ubuntu-chicago.org
* '''Planet''' (<code>blog agregator</code>): http://planet.chi.ubuntu-us.org
* '''Launchpad:''' https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-chicago
* '''Ubuntu Forums:''' <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/forumdisplay.php?f=247|Illinois sub-forum]]</nowiki>
* '''Mailing List:''' https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-chicago
* '''E-mail:'''  * '''List Archive:''' https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-us-chicago
